title: Kasei Yakyoku (Nightsong of Splendor)
synopsis: The story takes place in old Tokyo, the Tokyo of August-September 1923 (Showa 12). At this moment in time, the city is a mixture of extremes... past and present, rich and poor, good and bad. This is a city where we see both horsecarts and motorcars, swords and pistols, lords and businessmen.
voices: ['Nozawa, Nachi', 'Suzuki, Hiroko', 'Mutou, Reiko', 'Saka, Osamu', 'Tomoe, Seiko', 'Seki, Toshihiko']
staff: [['Dezaki, Satoshi', ['Producer']], ['Dezaki, Osamu', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Yamada, Etsuji', ['Sound Director']], ['Shinohara, Toshiya', ['Episode Director']]]
